listings.Description of job/activites: Collaborate with various teams to craft innovative digital solutions for brands. Your role? Designing 360 Advertising assets across diverse platforms, from print to digital. Responsibilities include crafting campaign assets, staying updated on design trends, generating creative designs, and developing digital assets for multiple platforms.
listings.Requirements/qualifications: Proficiency in design thinking, collaborative team player, client-facing design experience, expertise in Adobe Suite, strong image and video editing skills, understanding of Ad campaign best practices, mastery of visual design principles, proven track record in digital content creation, and a college portfolio showcasing digital design prowess.
